post:
Sorry our Easter offers are late but here they are regardless.

Hoping everyone had a fabolous Easter?

We are proud to introduce 3 new nodes to already existing locations, most are still awaiting delivery.

Dallas - E5-2620 HDD Storage Node - Operational
UK - E 2136 NVMe SSD - Not Delivered
France - E 2136 NVMe SSD - Not delivered

For further transparency, we have also decided to allow our clients and and those in search of a new service view our CPU usage on all of our host nodes as well as the uptime status. We have noticed little to no hosts offer this ability and feel it is only fair to allow residents to be aware of their environment and critical changes to it as we do. The status page can be found [here](https://kvm.doctor/status) and [here](https://hostdoc.co.uk/status) or via our site menu and footer links.

Our offers are limited in stock and are recurring for the life of the plan.
UK and France NVMe SSD orders will be pre-ordered and expected provisioning date will be the 25/26th of this month.

**Promotional plans are non refundable

<center>**<font color="blue">U</font><font color="red">S</font><font color="grey">A</font>**</center>
To launch our storage server and plans which are too expensive for LET, we are offering an exclusive storage Easter offer. Just as with the Xeon Gold, this E5 offers dedicated RAM, Dual processor and HWRAID 5 HDD storage.
These plans can be stacked up to 10TB storage per user.

    Intel Xeon E5-2620 @ 2.00Ghz

    500GB HDD
    1GB Dedicated RAM
    3TB Bandwidth @ 1gbps
    1 IPv4
    /64 IPv6
    Internal Network
    Dallas

£4.49/m | £50/y
[Order Here](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=791)
